story-moment.ULYSSES KLAUE: In South Korea, Okoye uses her skills with her spear during the pursuit of Ulysses Klaue.
story-moment.WAKANDA FOREVER: Okoye forces W’Kabi to surrender, making it clear she would chose Wakanda over him if forced to.
story-moment.WAR IN WAKANDA: Okoye and T’Challa inform Bucky Barnes the fight is coming to Wakanda.
story-moment.DESTROYING PROXIMA MIDNIGHT: Okoye teams with Black Widow to fight Proxima Midnight when Thanos’ army invades Wakanda.

powers+abilities.THE FIGHTER: An amazingly well-trained and skilled fighter, Okoye is capable of besting notably formidable foes, including numerous combatants at once.
powers+abilities.VIBRANIUM SPEAR: Okoye’s primary weapon is a collapsible vibranium spear she can wield both in close quarters fighting and as a throwing weapon.
powers+abilities.DEADLY PRECISION: Okoye is able to hit distant targets with deadly precision, throwing her spear and hitting intended targets with fantastic accuracy.
